comments:
Description:
Chart can not be rendered when inherit table data in Web Viewer.

Build number: 
2.2.1.v20070731-0928

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a table binding to a data set.
2. Insert a chart in table detail row and inherit table's data.
3. Preview in Web Viewer.

Expected result:
The charts are rendered correctly.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.

Error log:
null ( 1 time(s) )

The row data don't be got from DtE, maybe it is an error in DtE, reassign it to DtE to investigate.
